section.title: Problem
section.para: You have a big DocBook document, like a book, and you want to split each chapter, appendix etc. into a separate file.

section.title: Solution
section.para: There are two solution to this problems:

listitem.para: Apply a XSLT stylesheet which uses an extension element like exsl:document

section.title: Splitting with XSLT
section.para: The stylesheet in uses extension elements to create separate documents from the main output.
It can be customized with several parameters.

section.title: Discussion
section.para: Some discussion about problem and solution.
